_sText:
64 maxplayers

- Changes V2 -
* AutoKill eliminated to the 9min changed the AutoRespawn OFF
* Sound changed (5 sounds)
* Added Grenades
* Added impulse
* Removed Sound flags(Bug repetitive)
* 3DSkybox now focuses more battle to take their proper place in the sides
* Other visual changes and improvement in fps etc. ..


The objective of the map is to capture 5 flags to finish the game the losing team will be removed the weapons and teleport in a cage the winning team may kill them all. 

> To the 9min of the game will be removed from the AutoRespawn to finish the game


Each new round there will be various weapons a total 12 weapons to a maximum 300HP regeneration and speed more gravity. 

Note: you need the Plugins (AutoRespawn).
[AutoRespawn v1.0.3](http://forums.alliedmods.net/showthread.php?p=905786 "http://forums.alliedmods.net/showthread.php?p=905786")

Add server.cfg > ![sm_ar_enable 0](http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/155/sinttulojwd.png "sm_ar_enable 0")

To not load all maps with the plugin

> The map it will activate the command.
